title: Do or Don't: Neon
content:
The other day I was at World Market with Nathalie and saw slap bracelets in a jar by the register. Remember those? They seriously reminded me of elementary school (ah, the good ol' days). Nat didn't find me slapping my wrists, or hers for that matter, to be very cute so I went home empty-wristed. But now another trend from my golden years is here—neon!—and I've totally moved on. Specifically onto wanting this neon yellow rhinestone necklace. It's a playful take on the classic crystal necklace but is still much more refined than my grade school bracelets of choice. 

Are you feeling the neon trend? My personal philosophy on neon: a little bit goes a long way.

{Ann Taylor Sunburst necklace}
